GOBI 2025
Global Open Source Business Innovation Conference

DEC 21 · BEIJING

Unlock the Source, Create the Future | 释放源力，创造未来

Co-organizers

Register Now
Submit Talk / Demo

GOBI 2025 Mission

AI is becoming the ultimate bridge connecting developers and creators, bringing massive talent into the open source ecosystem like never before. A new creator-centric business paradigm is rising - it's no longer about simply consuming open source, but about empowering and amplifying open source as a digital public product. GOBI aims to transform individual creativity into a driving force for the future of industry. If you are an open source leader, developer, creator, ecosystem connector, or value discoverer, welcome to join GOBI 2025 to co-define and lead this great journey of source awakening!

Featured Speakers

Experts and practitioners from various fields

Internet and Cloud Providers

AI infrastructure, developer platforms, AIGC/Agent ecosystem leaders

Leading Open Source Projects and Maintainers

Models/frameworks/databases/data platforms

AI Developer Tools

Inference and training frameworks, monitoring and evaluation, DevEx toolchains

Industry and Investment

Enterprise open source leaders, industry research, investment firm partners

Policy and Standards

Foundations/associations, compliance and standards organizations

Agenda

09:00 - 10:00

Registration & Social Breakfast

10:00 - 10:15

Opening Remarks: GOBI 2025 & Upstream Training Camp Review

10:15 - 10:45

Keynote 1: Open Source Industry Development Overview

10:45 - 11:05

Keynote 2: Exploring Open Source Business Models (Theory and Practice)

11:05 - 11:25

Keynote 3: Sustainable Open Source Business Ecosystem Index (Theoretical Framework)

11:25 - 12:25

Panel Discussion: Source Power Awakening: Open Source Business in the AI Era

12:30 - 13:30

Lunch & Training Camp Lightning Talks

3-4 minutes each; Real-time audience + jury voting

13:30 - 14:30

Panel Discussion: Breakthrough · Individual Survival Rules in the AI Era

14:30 - 15:30

Panel Discussion: Gather Strength · Evolution and Future of Open Source Communities

15:30 - 16:00

Coffee Break & Demo Walk

15:30 - 16:30

Panel Discussion: Creation · AI-Driven New Renaissance

16:30 - 17:00

Upstream Open Source Business Innovation Project Showcase and Voting

17:00 - 17:10

Awards: Upstream Open Source Business Innovation Awards

17:10 - 17:30

Closing: From Source to Industry, 2026 Outlook

18:00 - 20:00

Dinner & Happy Hour

Guest / Attendee Networking

Schedule is subject to change

Featured Open Source Business Innovation Camp Projects

ChenLongOS extends Tsinghua University's uCore->rCore lineage into a fully open, componentized operating system tailored for embodied intelligence

ChenLongOS Robot Dev Stack

★ 0.8k stars 12.5 months
ANP imagines the agentic internet as a peer-to-peer fabric where identities, conversations, and transactions travel through open specifications

Agent Network Protocol (ANP)

★ 1.2k stars 8.3 months
DORA (Dataflow-Oriented Robotic Architecture) is middleware designed to streamline and simplify the creation of AI-based robotic applications

dora-rs Dataflow Robotics

★ 1.8k stars 36.8 months
FlagOS provides an open stack for domestic AI chips, enabling unified computing across different AI hardware platforms

FlagOS Unified AI Computing

★ 0.6k stars 18.2 months
KTransformers enables running trillion-parameter models on single rigs through heterogeneous inference optimization

KTransformers Heterogeneous Inference

★ 3.5k stars 15.7 months
MoFA is a collective of indie makers creating AI products, fostering innovation in the AI maker community

MoFA Makers Collective

★ 0.9k stars 24.3 months
Moxin provides private-grade speech AI for edge computing, enabling offline speech processing capabilities

Moxin AI Edge Speech Engine

★ 0.1k stars 3.3 months
Matrix is a Rust-native social graph with agent trust capabilities for decentralized collaboration

Matrix Suite for Decentralized Collaboration

★ 2.8k stars 85.6 months
Makepad provides full-stack Rust tooling for AI-native applications with creative software development platform

Makepad · Robius · Moly AI Studio

★ 5.3k stars 72.8 months

GOBI 2025 helps you rediscover your creative power through expert insights and community interaction

Breakthrough: Finding Certainty in the AI Era

Navigate through the fog of technology cycles, find your anchor of personal value in the AI wave, build a new dynamic system, and gain the inner certainty and confidence to transcend cycles.

Gather: Exploring the Source of Innovation in Community

Move beyond the bottleneck of individual learning, dive deep into open source communities, connect with collective wisdom through collaboration and contribution, and explore the living waters that nurture great innovations.

Create: Master AI to Achieve Your Da Vinci Moment

Infuse AI with your own taste and feelings, unleash creativity and imagination, and start your own renaissance.

Sustain: Let Passion Become a Sustainable Business Model

Master the methods of creation and collaboration in the AI era, connect with your '1000 true fans', build your own 'New Medici Effect', and turn passion into sustainable business.

Venue

Renaissance Beijing Haidian Hotel

Building 6, Yard 8, North Street, Dongsheng Science Park, Haidian District, Beijing

Located in the core area of Zhongguancun, Renaissance Beijing Haidian Hotel features modern conference facilities and comfortable accommodation environment, adjacent to many well-known technology companies and universities, with convenient transportation.

Join GOBI 2025

GOBI 2025 connects developers, businesses, and policy partners to explore sustainable paths from "source" to "industry".
